trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Romulus
There were no other sightings in Romulus on or around February 28th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home from work seen something different in area looked like a huge lamp post and stayed the same for about 10 seconds then it rotated 90 degrees counter clock wise and moved slowly toward the airport and i got a real good look at it over the freeway because it was moving very slowly. when i got home i drew a picture of what i saw.
Summary: Craft was still then rotated and moved slowy across freeway.
